name: Eldegoss
author: Kouki Saitou
flavor_text: The cotton on the head of this Pokémon can be spun into a glossy, gorgeous yarn—a Galar regional specialty.

abilities.name: Cotton Lift
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may search your deck for up to 2 basic Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Cotton Guard
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, this Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
